services.title: Weddings
services.description: Make your special day unforgettable with the perfect soundtrack. From ceremony to reception, I'll keep the dance floor packed.

services.title: Corporate Events
services.description: Professional entertainment for company parties, product launches, and corporate celebrations.

services.description: Birthday parties, anniversaries, graduations - whatever the occasion, I'll bring the energy.

services.title: Club Nights
services.description: High-energy sets that keep the crowd moving all night long. Specializing in house, hip-hop, and top 40.

pricing.note: Pricing varies based on event duration, location, and requirements. Contact for a custom quote.
